name: OKR Ontology Glossary
description: Comprehensive glossary of all terms, entities, properties, relationships, and enumerations in the OKR (Objectives and Key Results) Ontology

hasDefinedTerm.name: Objective
hasDefinedTerm.description: A qualitative, inspirational, time-bound goal that defines what an organization, team, or individual wants to achieve
hasDefinedTerm.businessMeaning: Represents a qualitative, inspirational, time-bound goal that defines what an organization, team, or individual wants to achieve
hasDefinedTerm.technicalMeaning: JSON-LD entity of type Objective that extends schema.org/Intangible
hasDefinedTerm.aiAgentUsage: Identify objectives at risk based on KR progress and confidence
constraints: Every objective must have between 2 and 5 key results
Every objective must have a defined time period with start and end dates
Objective progress is the weighted average of its key results

hasDefinedTerm.name: KeyResult
hasDefinedTerm.description: A quantitative, measurable outcome that indicates progress toward achieving an objective
hasDefinedTerm.businessMeaning: Represents a quantitative, measurable outcome that indicates progress toward achieving an objective
hasDefinedTerm.technicalMeaning: JSON-LD entity of type KeyResult that extends schema.org/Intangible
hasDefinedTerm.aiAgentUsage: Identify at-risk key results based on progress trends
constraints: Target value must be different from start value
Progress percentage calculated from current value relative to target
All key result weights for an objective should sum to 100

hasDefinedTerm.name: Initiative
hasDefinedTerm.description: A specific project, program, or action taken to achieve a key result
hasDefinedTerm.businessMeaning: Represents a specific project, program, or action taken to achieve a key result
hasDefinedTerm.technicalMeaning: JSON-LD entity of type Initiative that extends schema.org/Action
hasDefinedTerm.aiAgentUsage: Core entity for OKR framework operations

hasDefinedTerm.name: CheckIn
hasDefinedTerm.description: A periodic update recording progress, confidence, and commentary on an objective or key result
hasDefinedTerm.businessMeaning: Represents a periodic update recording progress, confidence, and commentary on an objective or key result
hasDefinedTerm.technicalMeaning: JSON-LD entity of type CheckIn that extends schema.org/Action
hasDefinedTerm.aiAgentUsage: Core entity for OKR framework operations

hasDefinedTerm.name: TimePeriod
hasDefinedTerm.description: A defined time period for objectives (e.g., quarterly, annually)
hasDefinedTerm.businessMeaning: Represents a defined time period for objectives (e.g., quarterly, annually)
hasDefinedTerm.technicalMeaning: JSON-LD entity of type TimePeriod that extends schema.org/Intangible
hasDefinedTerm.aiAgentUsage: Core entity for OKR framework operations

hasDefinedTerm.name: hasKeyResult
hasDefinedTerm.description: Links an Objective to its Key Results
hasDefinedTerm.businessMeaning: Links an Objective to its Key Results
hasDefinedTerm.technicalMeaning: RDF property linking okr:Objective to okr:KeyResult
hasDefinedTerm.aiAgentUsage: Enables AI agents to traverse relationships and understand connections in OKR graph

hasDefinedTerm.name: keyResultOf
hasDefinedTerm.description: Links a Key Result to its parent Objective
hasDefinedTerm.businessMeaning: Links a Key Result to its parent Objective
hasDefinedTerm.technicalMeaning: RDF property linking okr:KeyResult to okr:Objective
hasDefinedTerm.aiAgentUsage: Enables AI agents to traverse relationships and understand connections in OKR graph

hasDefinedTerm.name: hasInitiative
hasDefinedTerm.description: Links a Key Result to initiatives that support it
hasDefinedTerm.businessMeaning: Links a Key Result to initiatives that support it
hasDefinedTerm.technicalMeaning: RDF property linking okr:KeyResult to okr:Initiative
hasDefinedTerm.aiAgentUsage: Enables AI agents to traverse relationships and understand connections in OKR graph

hasDefinedTerm.name: supportsKeyResult
hasDefinedTerm.description: Links an Initiative to the Key Result it supports
hasDefinedTerm.businessMeaning: Links an Initiative to the Key Result it supports
hasDefinedTerm.technicalMeaning: RDF property linking okr:Initiative to okr:KeyResult
hasDefinedTerm.aiAgentUsage: Enables AI agents to traverse relationships and understand connections in OKR graph

hasDefinedTerm.name: alignsTo
hasDefinedTerm.description: Links an Objective to a higher-level Objective it aligns with
hasDefinedTerm.businessMeaning: Links an Objective to a higher-level Objective it aligns with
hasDefinedTerm.technicalMeaning: RDF property linking okr:Objective to okr:Objective
hasDefinedTerm.aiAgentUsage: Enables AI agents to traverse relationships and understand connections in OKR graph

hasDefinedTerm.name: alignedFrom
hasDefinedTerm.description: Links an Objective to lower-level Objectives aligned to it
hasDefinedTerm.businessMeaning: Links an Objective to lower-level Objectives aligned to it
hasDefinedTerm.technicalMeaning: RDF property linking okr:Objective to okr:Objective
hasDefinedTerm.aiAgentUsage: Enables AI agents to traverse relationships and understand connections in OKR graph

hasDefinedTerm.name: hasCheckIn
hasDefinedTerm.description: Links an Objective or Key Result to its check-ins
hasDefinedTerm.businessMeaning: Links an Objective or Key Result to its check-ins
hasDefinedTerm.technicalMeaning: RDF property linking ['okr:Objective', 'okr:KeyResult'] to okr:CheckIn
hasDefinedTerm.aiAgentUsage: Enables AI agents to traverse relationships and understand connections in OKR graph

hasDefinedTerm.name: checkInFor
hasDefinedTerm.description: Links a CheckIn to the Objective or Key Result it updates
hasDefinedTerm.businessMeaning: Links a CheckIn to the Objective or Key Result it updates
hasDefinedTerm.technicalMeaning: RDF property linking okr:CheckIn to ['okr:Objective', 'okr:KeyResult']
hasDefinedTerm.aiAgentUsage: Enables AI agents to traverse relationships and understand connections in OKR graph

hasDefinedTerm.name: dependsOn
hasDefinedTerm.description: Indicates a dependency between objectives or key results
hasDefinedTerm.businessMeaning: Indicates a dependency between objectives or key results
hasDefinedTerm.technicalMeaning: RDF property linking ['okr:Objective', 'okr:KeyResult'] to ['okr:Objective', 'okr:KeyResult']
hasDefinedTerm.aiAgentUsage: Enables AI agents to traverse relationships and understand connections in OKR graph

hasDefinedTerm.name: dependencyFor
hasDefinedTerm.description: Indicates what depends on this objective or key result
hasDefinedTerm.businessMeaning: Indicates what depends on this objective or key result
hasDefinedTerm.technicalMeaning: RDF property linking ['okr:Objective', 'okr:KeyResult'] to ['okr:Objective', 'okr:KeyResult']
hasDefinedTerm.aiAgentUsage: Enables AI agents to traverse relationships and understand connections in OKR graph

hasDefinedTerm.technicalMeaning: Controlled vocabulary for ObjectiveType
hasDefinedTerm.aiAgentUsage: Used for classification, filtering, and state management in AI reasoning
